What is Super Hero Driving School?
Can't open the game. How can I fix it?

controls: Use your left mouse button to speed up
content.howToPlay:
Forget everything you know about conventional driving schools with their mundane traffic drills. Here, you start from the top of a hill. Slam the pedal to the metal and take off!

Reach and crash through the finish wall! (Yes, it's a wall, not a line! We told you it's only for people with superpowers)Earn lots of coins for a safe landing.No worries if you crash; upgrade your car's power and boost, then fly again.Master car control through practice.
content.developer: Boombit S.A. developed the Super Hero Driving School.

fullContent: Home› CarSuper Hero Driving SchoolBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenBeing a superhero is tough. They get tired of flying through the air using only their arm strength.  Perhaps flying a car would be easier. But hey! You know what? Authorities require superheroes to have a driver's license, too. How uncool is that? Superheroes shouldn't have to deal with paperwork, but alas, rules are rules. You'll need to complete the course…As we have heard from Superman, there is some kind of strange driving school exclusively for superheroes. It has the craziest airborne tracks you can ever see in any other driving school. Anyway, you don't have many options if you're a superhero trying to learn how to fly cars, huh? Give this driving school a shot, and we guarantee you'll love performing stunts, barrel rolls, and flips in mid-air.ControlsUse your left mouse button to speed upHow to Play Super Hero Driving SchoolForget everything you know about conventional driving schools with their mundane traffic drills. Here, you start from the top of a hill. Slam the pedal to the metal and take off!Reach and crash through the finish wall! (Yes, it's a wall, not a line! We told you it's only for people with superpowers)Earn lots of coins for a safe landing.No worries if you crash; upgrade your car's power and boost, then fly again.Master car control through practice.Save Up Some Boost PowerIt's hard resisting to use all your boost right from the start for a lightning-fast ride. But, you might need to save some of the boost for later. Use just enough boost to reach your desired point. Make use of speed booster pads along the way and push your car's limits to complete each level.But beware, because superheroes can have super crashes!What is Super Hero Driving School?Super Hero Driving School is an online 3D driving game where you race downhill, perform stunts, and crash through the finish line. Explore 12 uniquely designed tracks filled with bizarre elements like giant cans, balls, wrecking balls, and other crazy obstacles. Unlock 9 amazing vehicles, including a school bus, motorbike, and even a jet!Can't open the game. How can I fix it?Ad blockers can cause this issue. Try disabling the ad blocker and refreshing the page. If it continues, visit our support page or leave a comment.DeveloperBoombit S.A. developed the Super Hero Driving School.More Flying Games OnlineWhat is that thing flying around? Is it a bird? Or a plane? Maybe it's a dragon.On OnlineGames.io, you choose what you'd like to fly. Pick among many titles on the Flying Games Online page and go on your adventure with a new vehicle (or an animal).This article was updated on July 17, 20241 Player3DCarCrashCrazyDestroyDrivingFlyingFreeFunPhysicsSpeedStunt
